Package gov.usgs.anss.edge

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MiniSeedOutputHandler
    This provides the interface that needs to be implemented for a class which can get Mini-Seed output (primarily from the compressor in RawToMiniSeed).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChannelSender
    This class creates a UDP end point and implements methods for sending data holdings to a UdpHolding server in some alarm process.
    ClientClientCopier
    This allows two different server ports to talk to this server and exchanged data.
    ClientClientCopier  
    CRC16  
    CWBEditor
    This class implements the delete and replace functions in a CWB.
    EdgeBlock
    this Block class just encapsulates a block in a data file with the additional data of the julian day and block number of the target, index block, extent index, node, and a sequence number.
    EdgeBlockPool
    This class forms a pool of EdgeBlocks which can be allocated and freed, but not run through the garbage collector.
    EdgeBlockQueue
    This class represents a ring buffer of the data blocks as they are written into disk blocks.
    EdgeProperties
    This class load the standard properties form edge.prop and then EDGEMOM/edge_N#I.prop as part of initializing and Edge/CWB process.
    FetchList  
    FetchList
    This class contains the data for a FetchList entry usually representing some data that is missing and needs to be acquired out-of-band of the realtime data.
    HoldingSummary
    This class holds a HoldingSummary record.
    HoldingSummary  
    IndexBlock
    This class handles index blocks for EdgeMom.
    IndexBlockCheck
    This class handles index check blocks for Replicators.
    IndexFile
    This class is the exclusive write manager of the .idx portion of the edge file.
    IndexFileReplicator
    This class is responsible for all file writes for a replicated file.
    IndexKey
    This class implements keys for the indexFile which are basically the Seedname and julian date.
    MasterBlock
    This class represents a master block from the .idx file.
    MiniSeedLog
    Examine any MiniSeed and 1) create log files from LOG channels, 2) send last sample from any non-administrative status channels to SeisNetWatch (mass position, voltages...), 3) do nothing on real data from transducers.
    MiniSeedOutputFile
    This class implements the MiniSeedOutputHandler and puts the data in a file.
    OORChan
    This class attempts to deal with the out-of-order data from sources like CD1.?.
    OutOfOrderRTMS
    This class is used by the RawToMiniSeed class to handle data that comes out of order (like the Aftac or CD 1.1 data).
    RawDisk
    This class present a block oriented read/write for the RandomAccessFile class.
    RawInputClient
    This class is a client to a RawInputServer which submits in the clear data to a edge or cwb combination.
    RawToMiniSeed
    This class allows a static entry where a the user submits a seed name, time and an array of 32-bit "in-the-clear" ints with a chunk of time series and this routine will output mini-seed blockettes ready for writing to the data system.
    RTMSBuf
    this class encapsulates the data needed by the RawToMiniSeed static process addTimeseries.
    Run
    This class creates encapsulates a continuous timeseries segment.
    RunList
    This class keeps a series of runs which may be from different seednames.
    StaSrvEdge
    This class uses the Stasrv service (originally on neisa, nsn8) to retrieve metadata from the server.
    TimedPrintStream  
    TimeoutThread
    Class is a time out thread which can be set up with some other thread to cause it to be interrupted() after some interval and destroy() after some longer interval.
    TimeSeriesBlock
    This is an abstract class describing the requirements for a generalized TimeSeriesBlock.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DuplicateIndexBlockCreatedException
    This Exception for the Edge/CWb system is thrown when two IndexBlocks are created at the same time.
    EdgeFileCannotAllocateException
    This exception is used by the EdgeCWB system when space is not available.
    EdgeFileDuplicateCreationException
    This exception happens when Edge data or index files are duplicated on creation due to a race condition.
    EdgeFileReadOnlyException
    This exception is thrown if the software is opening a Writeable file, but said file is readonly.
    IllegalSeednameException
    This exception is thrown by the various parts of the Edge/CWB system if the 12 character NNSSSSSCCCLL does not follow the restrictions on character content.
